comments: Champion's winnings & consolation amounts matched to Pancreatic Cancer Dream Team from Stand Up to Cancer.

final_jeopardy.clue: Introduced to readers in 2008, its name comes from a Latin phrase for "bread & circuses", offerings used to appease the masses
